text: Jack McCall, Desperado is a 1953 American western movie. It was directed by Sidney Salkow. The movie stars George Montgomery, Angela Stevens, Douglas Kennedy, and Eugene Iglesias. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Salkow Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1870s
title: Jack McCall, Desperado
